channel.title: Speech and Audio on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in Speech and Audio on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Acoustic Volume Rendering for Neural Impulse Response Fields
item.description: Acoustic Volume Rendering (AVR) revolutionizes realistic audio synthesis by adapting volume rendering to model acoustic impulse responses, achieving state-of-the-art performance in novel pose synthesi…

item.title: Annealed Multiple Choice Learning: Overcoming limitations of Winner-takes-all with annealing
item.description: Annealed Multiple Choice Learning (aMCL) overcomes limitations of Winner-takes-all in multiple choice learning by using annealing, improving robustness and performance.

item.title: CA-SSLR: Condition-Aware Self-Supervised Learning Representation for Generalized Speech Processing
item.description: CA-SSLR: a novel self-supervised learning model dynamically adapts to various speech tasks by integrating language and speaker embeddings, improving performance and reducing reliance on audio features…

item.title: FINALLY: fast and universal speech enhancement with studio-like quality
item.description: FINALLY achieves studio-like speech enhancement speed and quality using a novel GAN-based approach with WavLM-integrated perceptual loss, outperforming existing diffusion models.

item.title: SCOREQ: Speech Quality Assessment with Contrastive Regression
item.description: SCOREQ: a novel triplet loss contrastive regression approach for superior speech quality prediction, addressing generalization issues in no-reference metrics.

item.title: Separate and Reconstruct: Asymmetric Encoder-Decoder for Speech Separation
item.description: SepReformer: Asymmetric encoder-decoder model for efficient speech separation, achieving state-of-the-art performance with less computation.

item.title: SLIM: Style-Linguistics Mismatch Model for Generalized Audio Deepfake Detection
item.description: SLIM: A novel audio deepfake detection model leverages style-linguistics mismatch for superior generalization and explainability.

item.title: SongCreator: Lyrics-based Universal Song Generation
item.description: SongCreator: a novel AI system generates complete, high-quality songs from lyrics, surpassing existing methods in lyrics-to-song and lyrics-to-vocals generation.

item.title: Spike-based Neuromorphic Model for Sound Source Localization
item.description: Energy-efficient neuromorphic SSL model achieves state-of-the-art accuracy and robustness using Resonate-and-Fire neurons and a novel multi-auditory attention module.

item.title: Structured Multi-Track Accompaniment Arrangement via Style Prior Modelling
item.description: This AI system generates high-quality multi-track music arrangements from simple lead sheets using a novel style prior modeling approach, significantly improving both efficiency and musical coherence.
